Articles.Content:
I got KSP around two weeks back after it having my attention for well over 2 months. Sadly, due to finiancial reasons I didn't have the money to buy the game, untill a friend of mine bought it to me.

After that, I've been more hooked than ever. Now, I want to be a part of the forums as well, might not be THAT super active, but I will definetively read a lot on here!

So far, I've managed to get 3 victims... err Kerbals to Minmus and back, built a space station(can't really do an orbital rendezvous, so I let mechjeb do it and then dock manually using the dock allignment indicator mod), and run out of fuel while trying to establish a munar orbit after landing. Results were... horrendous, but mission successful! I mean, they didn't make it back, but they weren't stuck on the surface either. Success in my book.

This is going to be fun!
Welcome to the forums! One of the great things about KSP is that you can set your own standards of success, haha
